Of course. Todd swapped my sword, didn't he?

translation.en: -What? No. -Why are you protecting him?
Who'd protect Todd?
Guess we're just gonna have to do things the hard way.
translation.fr: On va devoir employer la manière forte.

translation.en: Hard way? Hold on a second. Wait. Just wait.
Peekaboo.
Yaah! Here, look.
Check it out. I'm in the locker room,
and you are looking at history in the making.
translation.fr: et vous assistez à un moment historique.

translation.en: Ballister's armor. It's speaking.
translation.fr: L'armure de Ballister ! Elle me parle.

translation.en: It's saying, "Respect me. Protect me. Put me on. No one's watching."
Awkward.
Oh, we can just fast-forward.
Okay, this is the part you have to see.
translation.fr: C'est ça que vous devez voir.

translation.en: The Director set me up.
She killed the queen.
translation.fr: C'est elle qui a tué la reine.

translation.en: I, I didn't know what to do. I tried to show you before…
translation.fr: Je savais pas quoi faire. J'ai essayé de vous le montrer.

translation.en: None of this makes sense.
Oh. Hey, buddy.
I'm sorry for kidnapping you.
It's okay.
-[deep voice] Or am I? -Oh! Oh!
Look, boss, you got betrayed by someone you trusted.
translation.fr: Écoutez, votre confiance a été trahie,

translation.en: I get it. It sucks. But we did it. You're innocent, and we have the proof.
translation.fr: je compatis, c'est nul. Mais on a la preuve de votre innocence.

translation.en: -Once we upload that video-- -We're not.
translation.fr: - On poste la vidéo et…- Non.

translation.en: What? Everybody needs to know the truth.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Tout le mondedoit connaître la vérité.

translation.en: The system is jacked. The Institute needs to shut down.
translation.fr: Les dés sont pipés !Faut faire fermer l'Institut.

translation.en: Will you be quiet?
Prospective target. Clear on Avenue Three. Over.
translation.fr: Aucune trace de la cible, avenue 3.

translation.en: I will not be quiet about this.
This video could damage people's faith in the Institute.
translation.fr: Ces images pourraientporter préjudice à l'Institut.

translation.en: No duh!
Look, I don't know why she framed me, but the Institute's not the problem.
translation.fr: J'ignore pourquoi elle a fait ça,mais c'est pas l'Institut, le problème.

translation.en: The Director is.
That's why I'm taking this to Ambrosius.
-Who cares? -Ambro--
This is the man who cut off your arm. Arm-chopping is not a love language!
translation.fr: C'est lui qui vous a coupé le bras. C'est pas une preuve d'amour !

translation.en: He didn't cut off my arm. He disarmed a weapon.
translation.fr: Il ne m'a pas coupé le bras.Il a neutralisé une arme.

translation.en: It's how we were trained.
They brainwashed you good.
translation.fr: Ils vous ont bien lavé le cerveau.

translation.en: You think this stops with the Director?
translation.fr: Vous croyez qu'il y a que la directrice ?

translation.en: You should be questioning everything right now.
translation.fr: Vous devriez tout remettre en cause.

translation.en: The will of Gloreth, the Institute, the wall.
translation.fr: La volonté de Gloreth, l'Institut, le Mur.

translation.en: What's it all really for? For protecting the realm.
translation.fr: - À quoi ça sert, en vrai ?- À protéger le royaume.

translation.en: You mean from villains like you?
Or monsters
like me?
Look, if we get this to Ambrosius, everything is gonna be okay.
translation.fr: Si on apporte ça à Ambrosius,tout va s'arranger.

translation.en: For both of us.
Okay, fine. But when things go south, I'm breaking stuff.
translation.fr: Bon, très bien.Mais dès que ça dégénère, je pète des trucs.

translation.en: -That won't be necessary. -[vocalizing]
Is something on your mind, Ambrosius?
translation.fr: Vous avez la tête ailleurs, Ambrosius ?

translation.en: You can talk to me.
My mind?
[exhales] I've lost my mind.
I've lost everything.
The man I love, my best friend.
translation.fr: L'homme que j'aime, mon meilleur ami.

translation.en: Although now he's got a new best friend. What's that about?
translation.fr: Cela dit, il a changé de meilleur ami.Ça veut dire quoi ?

translation.en: What else is he hiding? Who is the real him?
Who am I?
A direct descendant of Gloreth? I never asked for that.
translation.fr: Descendant direct de Gloreth ?J'ai rien demandé, moi.

translation.en: Now everyone expects me to arrest Ballister.
If I don't, I'm a traitor to you. If I do, I'm a traitor to him.
translation.fr: Si je le fais pas, je vous trahis.Si je le fais, je le trahis !

translation.en: Oh, and on top of that, I chopped off his arm!
translation.fr: Et pour couronner le tout,je lui ai coupé le bras !

translation.en: His arm! Who chops off an arm?
translation.fr: Son bras ! Comment j'ai pu faire ça ?

translation.en: Because I was trained to? Arm chopping is not a love langua--
translation.fr: Par réflexe ?Couper un bras n'est pas une preuve…

translation.en: I'm fine, Director.
translation.fr: Tout va bien, madame la directrice.

translation.en: -Ma'am. -Stay strong, Ambrosius.
The blood of Gloreth runs through your veins.
translation.fr: Le sang de Gloreth coule dans vos veines.

translation.en: -Ambrosius. -Knights!
They were like this when I got here.
translation.fr: Je les ai trouvés dans cet état.

translation.en: You.
Me.
Ambrosius, the Director killed the queen.
translation.fr: C'est la directrice qui a tué la reine.

translation.en: -What? -Another desperate lie.
He's not a liar.
[laughing] Says the miscreant, whispering in his ear.
translation.fr: Dit la mécréantequi lui susurre à l'oreille.

translation.en: Aw, thank you.
I'm innocent, and I have proof.
translation.fr: Je suis innocent. Et j'en ai la preuve.

translation.en: -He's got a weapon. -No!
Not anymore! Todd rules!
It doesn't matter. You shouldn't need proof.
translation.fr: Peu importe.Tu n'as pas besoin de preuve,

translation.en: You know I'm not a murderer.
translation.fr: tu sais que je ne suis pas un meurtrier.

translation.en: What are you waiting for, Captain?
[Todd] Hurry before the whale gets here.
translation.fr: Vite, avant que la baleine se pointe !

translation.en: Come on, man.
Do the right thing.
Who is she, Bal?
What is she?
Ambrosius, I am begging you to trust me.
translation.fr: Ambrosius, je te suppliede me faire confiance.

translation.en: Arrest them.
You wanna know who the kid is?
translation.fr: Tu veux savoir qui est cette gamine ?

translation.en: Oh, I like where this is going.
translation.fr: J'aime la tournure que ça prend.

translation.en: You wanna show 'em?
I'd love to.
Let's break stuff.
Metal.
Is that a gorilla?
-Give me a sword. -We need to get you to safety.
translation.fr: Donnez-moi une épée. Il faut vous mettre à l'abri.

translation.en: -Aah! -Get this thing in the air now!
-Oh! -Sorry, not sorry!
-You see a way out of here? -Of horse I do.
translation.fr: - Comment on se tire d'ici ?- Au triple galop.

translation.en: Okay, that was terrible.
Stop that… horse?
-We're going over, aren't we? -Yep! The only way out is down.
translation.fr: On saute, je parie. Oui, la seule issue est en bas !

translation.en: -Horse! -Why are we always falling?!
translation.fr: Gare au cheval ! Toujours ces sauts dans le vide !

translation.en: Ha ha! Told you you'd want the wings. Whoo-hoo!
-Okay, that was super gross. -Ha ha, I know!
Well, if it isn't the golden boy.
-That's the otter that bit me! -I can see your confusion.
translation.fr: La loutre qui m'a mordu. D'où la confusion.

translation.en: It has the tail of a river otter, but the webbed back feet--
translation.fr: Queue de loutre de rivière et pattes…

translation.en: Did I ever mean anything to you? Or was it all just a lie?
translation.fr: Tu as vraiment eu des sentiments pour moiou c'était des bobards ?

translation.en: A lie? Says the guy running around with a monster!
translation.fr: Des bobards ? Dit celui qui se baladeavec un monstre !

translation.en: Don't call her that! She's smart, kind, and quite sophisticated.
translation.fr: Ne dis pas ça ! Elle est intelligente,gentille et raffinée.

translation.en: That guy just peed his armor! He peed his armor!
translation.fr: Ce mec s'est pissé dessusdans son armure !

translation.en: And she has my back, unlike you. You lied to me about everything!
translation.fr: - Et elle me défend, contrairement à toi.- Tu m'as menti sur tout !

translation.en: Only one lying to you is the Director!
translation.fr: C'est la directrice qui te ment !

translation.en: What? You're gonna kill me now too? You believe that?
translation.fr: - Quoi ? Tu vas me tuer, moi aussi ?- C'est ce que tu crois ?

translation.en: Then you never knew me at all.
Yeah. Now I'm gonna punch you in the face.
Now, I'm no doctor, but this cast looks delicious.
translation.fr: Je suis pas médecin,mais ce plâtre est appétissant.

translation.en: Boss?
You think this hurts?
Wait till you see what we do to your pet monster.
translation.fr: On réserve bien pire à ton monstre.

translation.en: No! Leave her alone!
Kwispy! Wait, what?
Hope you brought milk.
Wait, wait! No, no!
What?
[automated voice] Monster attack. Monster attack. Seek immediate shelter.
translation.fr: Attaque de monstre. Mettez-vous à l'abri.

translation.en: -Monster attack. Monster attack. -It's okay.
-Monster attack. Monster attack. -M-Monster.
-Monster attack. -[knight] Her! Come on!
-I've got you, kid! -No! Stop!
-Are you okay? -I don't wanna talk about it.
translation.fr: - Ça va ?- Je veux pas en parler.

translation.en: -I know something's wrong. -I said I don't wanna talk about it!
translation.fr: - Il y a un problème.- Je veux pas en parler, j'ai dit !

translation.en: Hey, I'm just trying to help.
I don't need your help!
Did you see the way that little girl looked at me?
translation.fr: Vous avez vucomment la petite me regardait ?

translation.en: Kids.
Little kids.
They grow up believing that they can be a hero
translation.fr: On leur apprendqu'ils peuvent devenir des héros

translation.en: if they drive a sword into the heart of anything different.
translation.fr: s'ils transpercent le cœurde tout ce qui sort de l'ordinaire.

translation.en: And I'm the monster?
I don't know what's scarier.
translation.fr: Je sais pas ce qui m'effraie le plus.

translation.en: The fact that everyone in this kingdom wants to run a sword through my heart…
translation.fr: Le fait que tous les habitants du royaumeveulent me transpercer le cœur,

translation.en: or that sometimes
I just wanna let 'em.
We have to get you out of here.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on te sorte d'ici.

translation.en: We'll go over the wall.
We won't stop until we find someplace safe.
translation.fr: On ne s'arrêtera qu'une fois en lieu sûr.

translation.en: Okay, we'll go together.
Together?
Listen, you were right about everything. The Institute, the wall…
translation.fr: Écoute. Tu avais raison sur toute la ligne.L'Institut, le Mur.

translation.en: No matter what we do, we can't change the way people see us.
translation.fr: Quoi qu'on fasse,on nous regarde toujours de la même façon.

translation.en: You changed the way you see me.
translation.fr: Vous me regardez plus comme avant.

translation.en: Didn't you?
We can't let the Director get away with this.
translation.fr: La directrice doit pas s'en tirer.

translation.en: We shouldn't have to run.
translation.fr: On devrait pas avoir à fuir.

translation.en: And you made a deal, right?
We clear your name, you make me your sidekick.
translation.fr: On vous innocente,je deviens votre acolyte.

translation.en: You can't back out on a deal because you believe in truth and honor
translation.fr: Vous devez tenir parolecar vous croyez à la vérité,

translation.en: and blah, blah, blah. All that stupid stuff.
translation.fr: à l'honneur et à tous ces trucs débiles.

translation.en: Truth and honor aren't stupid, but all right.
translation.fr: La vérité et l'honneurne sont pas débiles, mais OK.

translation.en: So, you got a plan?
'Course I got a plan.
Something, something, something…
We win.
[knight] Excuse me, but the Director isn't available right now.
We need to talk!
Alone.
Was Ballister telling the truth?
He could've said anybody killed the queen, but he said you. Why you?
translation.fr: Il pouvait accuser n'importe qui,mais il vous accuse. Pourquoi vous ?

translation.en: Sir Goldenloin, is your loyalty to this kingdom
translation.fr: Sire Goldenloin,votre loyauté va-t-elle au royaume

translation.en: or to a knight who consorts with a monster?
translation.fr: ou à un chevalierqui s'allie à un monstre ?

translation.en: Did you swap his sword?
Did you set him up?
Tell me the truth!
Ever since I was young, I've had the same nightmare.
translation.fr: Depuis toute petite,j'ai un rêve récurrent.

translation.en: I find a crack in the wall.
translation.fr: Je découvre une fissure dans le Mur.

translation.en: I yell out,
but no one listens.
And the crack grows bigger and bigger
translation.fr: Et la fissure ne cesse de s'agrandir,

translation.en: until the wall crumbles
translation.fr: jusqu'à ce que le Mur s'effondre

translation.en: and the monsters pour in.
I begged the queen not to question the word of Gloreth.
translation.fr: J'ai supplié la reinede respecter la parole de Gloreth.

translation.en: Not to question what's kept us safe for a thousand years.
translation.fr: De ne pas remettre en causece qui nous protège depuis mille ans.

translation.en: But she wouldn't listen.
Allowing Ballister to hold the sword was the first crack in the wall.
translation.fr: Confier cette épée à Ballister,c'était la première fissure dans le Mur.

translation.en: And now
we have a monster in our kingdom.
translation.fr: nous avons un monstre dans le royaume.

translation.en: Is that…
I'm sorry, Ambrosius.
So, yes, I framed Ballister.
I killed the queen.
Gloreth did whatever it took to keep the monsters out.
translation.fr: Gloreth était prête à toutpour repousser les monstres.

translation.en: And so will I.
May Gloreth forgive you.
[Director] So, yes, I framed Ballister.
I killed the queen.
I can't wait for the kingdom to see this.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte que tout le royaume voie ça.

translation.en: You.
Well, and my sidekick. Round of applause, ladies and gents.
translation.fr: Et mon acolyte. On l'applaudit bien fort.

translation.en: Was my acting okay? I was a little worried my last "Ehh" was too over the top.
translation.fr: J'ai bien joué ?J'avais peur que mon dernier… soit un peu forcé.

translation.en: If you're looking for feedback, it was a little dramatic.
translation.fr: Puisque tu demandes,c'était un peu surjoué.

translation.en: You won't win any awards, but it was good.
translation.fr: T'auras pas de prix, mais c'était bien.

translation.en: I've never taken a class. Really? That's a surprise.
translation.fr: - J'ai jamais pris de cours.- Ah bon ? Ça m'étonne.

translation.en: Not a one. Oh, don't forget your sword, boss.
Eh, she can keep it.
I don't fight for her anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne me bats plus pour elle.

translation.en: You called me your sidekick. I did, didn't I?
translation.fr: - Vous avez dit "mon acolyte".- Tu as vu ?

translation.en: [singsong] You called me your sidekick.
And I regret it already.
[singsong] You called me your sidekick. You called me…
We need to talk.
Bad time?
Come on, come on!
Yes! Let's take that pooch for a walk.
translation.fr: C'est l'heure de sortir le chien.

translation.en: Eight, nine, ten.
Ooh, landing you in the Enchanted Forest, which is my domain.
translation.fr: La Forêt enchantée, c'est chez moi.

translation.en: Cha-ching. 600 gold, please.
My Scottie dog will not pay your tyrannical toll.
translation.fr: Mon scottish terrierne paiera pas ce loyer indu.

translation.en: He rallies the oppressed woodland creatures and starts a rebellion.
translation.fr: Il mobilise les animaux oppriméset lance la rébellion.

translation.en: [blows fanfare] Squirrels scale the castle walls!
Bears batter down the gates! Letting chaos ensue!
translation.fr: Les ours défoncent les porteset c'est l'anarchie !

translation.en: -I'm still taking the 600 gold. -What?
You didn't tell me you could breathe fire.
translation.fr: Tu n'avais pas ditque tu crachais du feu.

translation.en: [chuckles] Metal. Best two out of three?
What?
Nothing.
Hey, check it out.
Whoa! A hundred-- 500-- 30,000--
Seventy-five-- The whole kingdom is seeing this thing.
translation.fr: Soixante-quinze… Tout le royaume regarde la vidéo !

translation.en: Well, I guess there's only one question left.
translation.fr: Alors une seule question reste en suspens.

translation.en: What's that?
Can a shark dance?
Can a shark dance?
Watch me. [snaps teeth]
Still reeling from the monster attack, the kingdom is rocked
translation.fr: À peine remis de l'attaque du monstre,le royaume est ébranlé

translation.en: by new footage of the Director making a truly shocking confession.
translation.fr: par des images de la directricefaisant des aveux stupéfiants.

translation.en: I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
translation.fr: J'ai piégé Ballister. J'ai tué la reine.

translation.en: ♪ Is it ever gonna be enough? ♪ I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
I killed the queen.
One question remains. Who's the real villain?
translation.fr: Une question demeure :qui est le véritable méchant ?

translation.en: -♪ More and more, more and more ♪ -Give us the Director!
♪ More and more, more and more ♪
-With me. -Yes, sir.
Director!
You're under arrest for the murder of the queen and for--
translation.fr: Je vous arrête. Pour le meurtre de la reine et…

translation.en: Ambrosius. This explains everything.
[man on TV] Zombies are immortal, eternal beings. There's no way to kill them.
translation.fr: Les zombies sont immortels,on ne peut pas les tuer.

translation.en: [woman on TV] But what if they come for us?
I can't believe I'm about to say this, but I actually feel bad for the zombies.
translation.fr: J'aurais jamais imaginé dire ça un jour, mais je plains les zombies.

translation.en: -Stop. Don't. -Hey.
It's okay. You're safe.
translation.fr: Tout va bien, tu es en sécurité.

translation.en: -We're home. -Home?
translation.fr: - On est à la maison.- À la maison ?

translation.en: I like it here.
Let's live here forever.
translation.fr: On devrait vivre ici pour toujours.

translation.en: -You have 30 seconds. -Thirty seconds?
-That's a lot more than you've given me. -I'm here to save you.
translation.fr: - J'ai pas eu ça.- Je veux te sauver.

translation.en: -You are so full of-- -Hey! Can I get you guys something?
translation.fr: Tu te fous de ma… Je vous sers quoi ?

translation.en: -Nachos! -Nachos!
Please.
And hold the olives.
He's allergic.
Bal, I wouldn't be here if it wasn't important.
translation.fr: Je serais pas venusi c'était pas important.

translation.en: And I wouldn't be here if you'd stood up for me. That is not fair.
translation.fr: - J'en serais pas là si tu m'avais aidé.- Tu es injuste.

translation.en: -We're done. So is she. -We now go live to the Institute.
translation.fr: C'est fini entre nous ! Et pour elle.

translation.en: -There is something I need to tell you. -[man] Hey, turn that up.
translation.fr: J'ai un truc à te dire. Montez le son.

translation.en: Citizens of the realm, that is not me in the recording.
translation.fr: Citoyens du royaume, ce n'est pas moique l'on voit sur ces images.

translation.en: I know it looks like me and sounds like me, but it is not me.
translation.fr: Je reconnais que l'on peut s'y méprendre,mais ce n'est pas moi.

translation.en: That was the monster working with the real queen killer, Ballister.
translation.fr: C'est le monstre, de mècheavec le véritable assassin de la reine, Ballister.

translation.en: They are trying to trick you.
That's a lie.
We are under attack by something that can take any form.
translation.fr: Nous sommes la proie d'un être métamorphe

translation.en: It could be anyone.
Your spouse, your child, your best friend,
the person sitting next to you.
translation.fr: votre meilleur ami ou votre voisin.

translation.en: None of us are safe
so long as the villain and that monster are still out there.
translation.fr: tant que ce criminelet ce monstre seront en liberté.

translation.en: She's twisting everything.
Ambrosius, I'm not the villain here.
translation.fr: Ambrosius. C'est pas moi, le criminel.

translation.en: I know.
I know.
I believe you.
I'm sorry
for everything.
translation.fr: Pour tout ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: For your arm.
She manipulated you.
She manipulated both of us,
translation.fr: Elle s'est servie de nous deux.

translation.en: but together, we'll take her down and prove it to the kingdom.
translation.fr: Mais ensemble, on va montrerau royaume qui elle est réellement.

translation.en: You'll be a knight again.
Thank you. The Director can't get away--
translation.fr: Merci. - La directrice ne doit pas s'en…- La directrice ?

translation.en: The Director?
translation.fr: - La directrice ne doit pas s'en…- La directrice ?

translation.en: Bal, I'm talking about your sidekick.
translation.fr: Bal, je parle de ton acolyte.

translation.en: Your sidekick set you up.
What?
This was all her plan.
translation.fr: C'était son plan depuis le début.

translation.en: All of it.
She's evil, Bal.
E-Evil?
No, you're wrong. We've been wrong about everything.
translation.fr: Non, tu te trompes.On s'est trompés sur toute la ligne.

translation.en: Wrong about everything? Then explain this.
This scroll has been in the Institute vaults for a thousand years.
translation.fr: Ce rouleau est dans le coffrede l'Institut depuis mille ans.

translation.en: Look at it.
It's her, Bal.
She's Gloreth's monster.
She's come back to finish what she started,
translation.fr: Elle termine ce qu'elle avait commencé

translation.en: and she's using you to do it.
translation.fr: en se servant de toi pour y arriver.

translation.en: But she's my friend.
Aren't I more than that?
translation.fr: Moi, je ne suis pas plus que ça ?

translation.en: We can slay this monster. We can go back to the way things were.
translation.fr: On peut tuer ce monstre.Et tout redeviendra…

translation.en: -This was a mistake. -Bal, please.
-No, I can't do this. I'm done! -Listen to me!
translation.fr: - Non, je peux pas faire ça.- Écoute-moi !

translation.en: She's using you to destroy the kingdom!
translation.fr: Elle se sert de toipour détruire le royaume.

translation.en: -You know what she is. -Stop!
-Why won't you admit it? You're in danger! -Why can't you just leave me alone?
translation.fr: Admets-le. Tu es en danger. Pourquoi tu me fiches pas la paix ?

translation.en: Because I love you.
Ohh. I have not slept like that in forever.
translation.fr: J'avais pas aussi bien dormidepuis une éternité.

translation.en: Why do you have your cloak on?
Is this you?
Where did you get that? Who have you been talking--
translation.fr: D'où ça sort ? À qui vous avez parlé ?

translation.en: Tell me this isn't you.
You think that I would do that?
translation.fr: Vous croyez que je ferais ça ?

translation.en: That that's who I am?
I don't know.
You're the one who told me not to trust anybody, question everything.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui m'as ditde me méfier de tous et de tout.

translation.en: That's right! Even now, with this,
think about everything we have been through together.
translation.fr: Pensezà tout ce qu'on a traversé ensemble.

translation.en: I'm thinking about everything we've done.
translation.fr: Je pense à tout ce qu'on a fait ensemble.

translation.en: Broken out of jail, stolen cars, kidnapped people, manipulated people.
translation.fr: Évasion de prison,vol de voiture, enlèvement, manipulation !

translation.en: I was helping you.
You were using me! You wanted them to see a villain.
translation.fr: Tu t'es servie de moi ! Tu as fait de moi l'ennemi publicpour ne pas être seule.

translation.en: Someone else to hate so you wouldn't be alone.
translation.fr: Tu as fait de moi l'ennemi publicpour ne pas être seule.

translation.en: Because you're not a sidekick. You're a m--
translation.fr: Parce que tu n'es pas une acolyte.Tu es un m…

translation.en: What? I'm a what?
You know what you are.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que tu es.

translation.en: No, I want to hear you say it.
translation.fr: Je veux vous entendre le dire.

translation.en: Come on, say it.
Say it!
Say that I'm a mon--
-I… -[Todd] Surround the place. You two with me.
translation.fr: Bouclez les lieux. Vous deux, avec moi !

translation.en: Your door is broken.
-Stay back! -No! Stop! Stop! She's my friend!
She's a monster.
[man] Surround it!
No!
[man] Gloreth! Come here!
Go back to the shadows from whence you came.
translation.fr: Retourne aux ténèbres d'où tu viens.

translation.en: -[Ballister] What are you -[girl] A monster.
[Ballister] Are you even human?
Just be a girl. [woman] There is no place for you!
translation.fr: - Sois simplement une fille.- Tu n'as rien à faire ici.

translation.en: -[Ballister] Don't lie to me! -[whisper] She's a monster.
translation.fr: - Ne me mens pas.- Un monstre.

translation.en: Don't you wish you were normal? [Gloreth] Go back to the shadows from whence you came.
translation.fr: Retourne aux ténèbres d'où tu viens.

translation.en: [Ballister] There's something wrong with you. What are you?
-[woman] Monster! -[Ballister] You know what you are!
translation.fr: - Monstre !- Tu sais ce que tu es !

translation.en: You brought a monster into our home.
translation.fr: Tu as amené un monstre chez nous.

translation.en: You should've stayed in the gutter where you belong.
translation.fr: Fallait rester à ta place,dans le caniveau.

translation.en: Now where is it?
Do you feel that? I feel like the whole place kind of went like "wubba, wubba, wubba, wubba, wubba."
translation.fr: Vous avez senti ?Comme si le bâtiment faisait…

translation.en: No.
It's headed straight for the city. Alert the Institute.
translation.fr: Il file tout droit vers la ville.Alertez l'Institut.

translation.en: And you.
If that thing destroys the kingdom, it's on you, bro.
translation.fr: si cette chose détruit le royaume,ce sera ta faute.

translation.en: Let's go!
Ma'am, incoming report from Sir Thodeus.
translation.fr: Madame, un rapport de sire Thodeus.

translation.en: -And? What is it? -[knight] Whoa.
-What is that? -What's going on?
We need barricades on Avenue A through F.
translation.fr: On barricade les avenues A à F.

translation.en: And can we clear the streets? These people are in danger.
translation.fr: On peut évacuer les rues ?Ces gens sont en danger.

translation.en: It's happening.
Sound the alarm! Sound the alarm! Hit it with everything we've got.
translation.fr: Sonnez l'alarme ! Lancez toutes nos forces !

translation.en: [automated voice] Monster attack. Monster attack.
This is not a test.
It's the monster!
Everyone stay calm.
Drones engaged.
Look out!
You're okay.
[Todd] Hey, Goldie. Watch how a real knight gets it done.
translation.fr: Goldie ! Admire le vrai chevalier à l'œuvre.

translation.en: All right, monster slayers.
Let's shoot some darts and break some hearts.
translation.fr: on va canarder en chœuret briser des cœurs !

translation.en: I'm gonna be a freaking hero.
Out of my way!
We need more firepower! This thing is gonna kill us all!
translation.fr: Sortez les armes lourdes ! Ce truc va tous nous tuer !

translation.en: [woman] Look out!
-High five! -Bro.
[man] Get out of here!
Get me to the wall.
[automated voice running down] Monster attack. Monster attack.
What have I done?
[announcer] The game that lets you be a hero.
translation.fr: Le jeu dont vous êtes le héros.

translation.en: I killed a monster!
I killed two!
Come on. Let's go.
Help!
Keep them moving. Get everyone underground.
translation.fr: Emmenez tout le monde sous terre.

translation.en: Bal?
-Bal! -[man] Forget the kid. Let's go.
-Let's go! -Come on!
You've gotta be kidding me.
Ma'am, someone is turning the cannon into the kingdom.
translation.fr: Madame, quelqu'un dirige le canon vers la ville.

translation.en: Yes, I know. I gave the order.
translation.fr: Je sais.C'est moi qui en ai donné l'ordre.

translation.en: But firing them will take out half the city.
translation.fr: Les tirs vont détruirela moitié de la ville.

translation.en: Innocent people will die.
-And so will the monster. -But--
What are we doing?
You don't belong here!
[Nimona] I don't know what's scarier.
translation.fr: Je sais pas ce qui m'effraie le plus.

translation.en: The fact that everyone in this kingdom wants to run a sword through my heart…
translation.fr: Le fait que tous les habitants du royaumeveulent me transpercer le cœur…

translation.en: or that sometimes…
I just wanna let 'em.
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
I see you, Nimona.
And you're not alone.
Fire the cannons.
Kill it.
-I said fire the-- -No!
It's over.
It's fooling you. Fooling all of you!
translation.fr: Cette chose se joue de vous.De vous tous !

translation.en: Can't you see this is what it wants? For us to let our guard down!
translation.fr: Ne voyez-vous pas qu'elle attendque nous baissions la garde ?

translation.en: I see what it really is, and so did Gloreth!
translation.fr: Moi, je vois son vrai visage,comme l'a fait Gloreth !

translation.en: That monster is a threat to our very way of life!
translation.fr: Ce monstre menace notre mode de vie !

translation.en: And what if we're wrong?
What if we've always been wrong?
translation.fr: Si on se trompait depuis le début ?

translation.en: Let's go!
That gun's gonna kill everyone.
translation.fr: Ce canon va tuer tout le monde.

translation.en: Hey, boss.
Be right back. I'm gonna go break some stuff.
translation.fr: Je reviens tout de suite. Je vais péter des trucs.

translation.en: -Wait, Nimona. What are you-- -It's time to rewrite this story.
translation.fr: - Nimona, tu…- On va réécrire cette histoire.

translation.en: Go back to the shadows from whence you came!
translation.fr: Retourne aux ténèbres d'où tu viens !

translation.en: Nimona!
Come back.
Please come back.
[Ballister] Some of us don't get the happily ever after we were looking for.
translation.fr: Certains d'entre nous ne pourront pasvivre heureux à tout jamais.

translation.en: Maybe it's not that kind of kingdom.
translation.fr: On n'est peut-être pasdans le bon royaume.

translation.en: Or maybe it's not the end of the story.
translation.fr: Ou ce n'est pas la fin de notre histoire.

translation.en: [girl] Over here, I'm free.
Hey, boss.
Holy sh--
♪ Future on my mind ♪ ♪ I'm leavin' the past behind ♪
translation.fr: D'APRÈS LE ROMAN GRAPHIQUEDE ND STEVENSON
